system:
note description: "Base class for widgets that contain EV_ITEMs" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "item, list" date: "$Date: 2017-05-03 08:56:14 -0700 (Wed, 03 May 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100317 $"
deferred class ../interface/ev_item_list.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST [G -> ../interface/ev_item.xmlEV_ITEM]
inherit ../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY export {../interface/ev_any_handler.xmlEV_ANY_HANDLER} ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create undefine Falseis_equal redefine ../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST [G] redefine ../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
feature -- Access
f_item_by_data../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_item_by_dataitem_by_data (some_data: FalseANY): detachable like ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_itemitem obsolete "Use `retrieve_item_by_data (some_data, True)' instead. [2017-05-31]" -- First item with some_data. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed data_not_void: some_data /= Void do Result := ../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_item_list_i.xml#f_item_by_dataitem_by_data (some_data) ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_item_list_i.xml#f_item_by_dataitem_by_data (some_data) end
feature {NONE} -- Contract support
f_is_in_default_state../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current in its default state? do Result := ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST} end
feature {NONE} -- Contract support
f_parent_of_items_is_current../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_parent_of_items_is_currentparent_of_items_is_current: FalseBOOLEAN -- Do all items have parent Current? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed local c: FalseCURSOR item_par: detachable ../interface/ev_item_list.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST [G] do Result := True c := ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_cursorcursor from ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_startstart until Falseafter or Result = False loop if attached ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_itemitem as l_item then item_par ?= l_item.../interface/ev_item.xml#f_parentparent if item_par /= Current then Result := False end end ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_forthforth end ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_go_togo_to (c) end
f_items_unique../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_items_uniqueitems_unique: FalseBOOLEAN -- Are all items unique? -- (ie Are there no duplicates?) require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed local c: FalseCURSOR l: FalseARRAYED_LIST [G] do create l.Falsemake (../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_countcount) Result := True c := ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_cursorcursor from ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_startstart until Falseafter or not Result loop if l.Falsehas (../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_itemitem) then Result := False end l.Falseextend (../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_itemitem) ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_forthforth end ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_go_togo_to (c) end
f_lists_equal../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_lists_equallists_equal (list1, list2: FalseDYNAMIC_LIST [G]): FalseBOOLEAN -- Are elements in list1 equal to those in list2. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed list1_not_void: list1 /= Void list2_not_void: list2 /= Void local cur1, cur2: FalseCURSOR do if list1 = list2 then Result := True else if list1.Falsecount = list2.Falsecount then from cur1 := list1.Falsecursor cur2 := list2.Falsecursor list1.Falsestart list2.Falsestart Result := True until list1.Falseafter or else Result = False loop Result := list1.Falseitem = list2.Falseitem list1.Falseforth list2.Falseforth end list1.Falsego_to (cur1) list2.Falsego_to (cur2) end end end
feature -- Implementation
f_changeable_comparison_criterion../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_changeable_comparison_criterionChangeable_comparison_criterion: FalseBOOLEAN = False -- May Falseobject_comparison be changed? -- (Answer: no by default.
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_item_list_i.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST_I [G] -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics -- toolkit.
invariant parent_of_items_is_current: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable and then not Falseis_empty implies ../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_parent_of_items_is_currentparent_of_items_is_current items_unique: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable and not Falseis_empty implies ../interface/ev_item_list.xml#f_items_uniqueitems_unique

end -- class ../interface/ev_item_list.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST
